Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class RobinServiceEndpoint

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.HttpEndpoint
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.ServiceEndpoint
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.RobinServiceEndpoint
public class RobinServiceEndpoint extends ServiceEndpoint
Extended service endpoint for Robin-specific statistics.

This class extends ServiceEndpoint to add Robin-specific metrics including:

- SMTP listener thread pool statistics

- Relay queue size and retry histogram

- Retry scheduler configuration and cron execution stats

- Metrics cron execution stats

- Configuration reload via HTTP API endpoint

    • handleConfigViewer

      private void handleConfigViewer(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles GET requests to display configuration viewer UI. Shows properties and server configuration in formatted JSON with reload button.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HTTP exchange object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • handleConfigReload

      private void handleConfigReload(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles POST requests to reload server configuration. Thread-safe using synchronized block to serialize reload operations. Configuration changes apply immediately without server restart.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HTTP exchange object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • handleHealth

      protected void handleHealth(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Handles requests for the application's health status with Robin-specific stats.

      Provides a JSON response with status, uptime, listeners, queue, scheduler, and metrics cron information.

      Overrides:
      handleHealth in class ServiceEndpoint
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HTTP exchange object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • buildConfigViewerHtml

      private String buildConfigViewerHtml(String propertiesJson, String serverJson) throws IOException
      Builds the HTML page for configuration viewer by loading from resource file and replacing placeholders. Adds lazy-loaded external server configuration maps at the bottom.
      Parameters:
      propertiesJson - Properties configuration as JSON string.
      serverJson - Server configuration as JSON string.
      Returns:
      Complete HTML page.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the resource file cannot be read.

      Parameters:

      title - Section title.
